modules.description: Processes and modifies parsing actions and inherited values during grammar evaluation, handling position tracking and debug information. Operates on custom parser states, lists, arrays, and hash tables. Used to convert rule lists into mapping structures, manage semantic values, and support parser transformations with detailed context.

Provides parsing and transformation functions for context-free grammars, including production rule expansion and attribute propagation. Operates on abstract syntax trees and grammar specifications represented as labeled tuples and lists. Used to generate parser tables and evaluate semantic attributes during compiler front-end processing.

manages parser states, tracking positions and debug data while transforming rule lists into mappings. It manipulates semantic values using lists, arrays, and hash tables, enabling precise control over parsing behavior. Operations include modifying inherited values, restructuring parse trees, and injecting context during evaluation. Examples include customizing error handling, optimizing parse results, and integrating external data during parsing.
